name: Blocky Jump Bro 3D - Run Block Roads Escape Adventure Story
name_original: Blocky Jump Bro 3D - Run Block Roads Escape Adventure Story
description:
Jump, swing, fly blocky bro GO!

WARNING: This game is highly addictive

[How to play]

> Tilt your device to move
> Get as high as you can
> Avoid falling and the spikes!

[Features]

> Easy to learn
> Highly addictive
> Game center leaderboard
> Endless style gameplay
